text: Hans Modrow (; 27 January 1928 – 10 February 2023) was a German politician. He was best known as the last communist premier of East Germany. He was the honorary Chairman of the Left Party. After the German reunification, Modrow served as a member of the European Parliament (1999–2004) and of the Bundestag. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Politicians of the Left Party Category:Members of the Volkskammer Category:MEPs for Germany Category:People from former German territories Category:Politicians of the Socialist Unity Party of Germany Category:Prime Ministers of East Germany
title: Hans Modrow
